body: This is what the official C++ docs recommended as the pattern. Initializer lists, _but not arguments to functions_, have sequence points between their commas. This is important because each of those push_backs is side-effectful.
body_html: This is what the official C++ docs recommended as the pattern. Initializer lists, but not arguments to functions, have sequence points between their commas. This is important because each of those push_backs is side-effectful.
